title: Die Lun√¶ 6 Septemb. 1647. An ordinance or the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that from henceforth no moneys clipt, filed, or deminished, shall be payable, or received in payment within this kingdom.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Baily,
notes: No diminished money shall be current, but be treated as bullion. Worn coin is still tender -- Cf. Steele.
Order to print signed: Jo. Browne Cler. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
